person3.name: Grandschtroumpf
person3.bio: When I don't teach human to use softwares, I build softwares to teach human to use sofwares. Maybe one day I'll teach softwares how to build software to teach human ...

person4.name: lianahus
person4.bio: Joined EF at the beginning of 2015, right after the Devcon0, was in the Solidity team then moved to the Remix when we start this beautiful project. I speak English, German, Russian and Armenian. I like music, traveling and indoor gardening.
